body.name: Projector 4K with Android TV, YABER K2s 800 ANSI WiFi 6 Bluetooth Projector, Sound by JBL, Dolby Audio, Auto Focus & Keystone, Native 1080P 4K Supported Outdoor Movie Projector with Netflix 7000+ Apps
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 9 hrs 54 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 14 hrs 54 mins
features: ➤【Superior audio experience - Dolby Audio & JBL 】This home theater projector built-in dual 10W JBL stereo speakers of ,coupled with Dolby Audio support, create a dynamic & immersive sound experience that elevates movie nights, gaming sessions, and presentations to new heights.Two-way Bluetooth, you can turn off the screen and use it as a JBL Bluetooth speaker.

➤【Stunning Picture Quality - 800ANSI | 4K supported 】 With its 1080p display resolution and 800 ANSI Lumens brightness, this outdoor video projector display every detail with incredible brightness, contrast, and color to deliver a perfect picture in your room at every moment.

➤【 Limitless Entertainment - Android TV 】 K2s wifi bluetooth projector with 7000+ apps gives you access to over 400,000+ movies and TV episodes. Watch favorites from Netflix, Prime Video, YouTube, Disney+, HBO Max, and others.Also the TV dongle is detachable for most micro HDMI output devices, laptops, PCs, tablets, etc., plug and play

➤【 More than smart - Auto Screen Adaptation & NFC Screencast 】 K2s smart tv projector boasts an innovative NFC Screencast function,by simply tapping your NFC-enabled phone to the projector, you can effortlessly cast movies to your screen.And auto focus & keystone correction for perfect image alignment and sharp visuals, making it incredibly easy to share your content on the big screen.

➤【 Hands-free - Alexa Voice Control 】 Pair with your Alexa and go control your k2s projector, switching signal,opening Netflix,adjusting volume, enhance your entertainment experience.Yaber offers 24/7 service6-Month back and 3-Year repair, lifetime technical support.Any problem please be free to contact our after-sale email

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: YABER K2s brings you a Cinematic audio-visual experience

Previous page During Quiet Mode it generates 25% lower noise and save 40% energy Next page 1 JBL | Dobly Audio 2 800ANSI Ultra Brightness 3 Lower noise < 28db 4 Faster transfer speeds 5 More personalized

Creating an immersive home theater has never been easier No worry about copyright issues, Yaber K2s provides you with all the content you want to watch.Also the TV dongle is detachable for most HDMI output devices, laptops, PCs, tablets, etc., plug and play.

Alexa and HDMI CEC make operation more convenient and smart Say, “Alexa, switch to HDMI on projector” or “Alexa, open Netflix on projector,” to switch signal source with one command,or use your voice to turn your volume up and down. * For Alexa voice commands, please refer to the attachment document. Bothered by multiple remotes ? Turning on the HDMI CEC option will help you out! It allows you to use one remote to control multiple HDMI devices, such as the Amazon Fire Stick/Ruko stick.（Notice: HDMI CEC needs to be turned on for all devices. ) Screen sharing with just a tap K2s smart projector allow you to instantly share their content from NFC-enabled smartphone with just a simple tap, making it the ultimate solution for hassle-free and quick presentations or impromptu movie nights. * Download app and connection to the same wifi network required.App can turn your phone into a remote.

Automatically delivers perfect image alignment and sharp visuals The auto focus and keystone correction capabilities of the K2s eliminates the need for manual adjustments, ensuring that images are always in perfect focus and alignment, making it perfect for movie nights where you just want to sit back and relax. Put your little screen on the big screen Stream the entertainment you love from your phone, tablet or laptop to k2s projector on the big screen.Recommended projection size 40-200 inches.

Need two remote for control ？Turn on the HDMI CEC option will help you out ! The K2S comes with HDMI CEC, which allows you to control the TV dongle using the projector's remote control, except when configured for the first time. Why is there no picture displayed when connecting PS3/PS4/PS5/DVD with HDMI port? You can turn off the HDMI HDCP option in the PS4/PS5 settings and the problem will be solved. As for PS3, if you can't turn off HDCP in the settings, you can contact our after-sales email. We will send you the updated software. Why is TV dongle not included in the accessory box ? The TV dongle is pre-installed inside the projector, so you can't find it in the accessory box.If you want to disassemble, please refer to the instruction. Why do the autofocus and autocorrect functions not work properly? Make sure the projector is not tilted more than 20 degrees. Is it possible to stream Netflix Hulu videos/shows on the K2s directly ? YABER K2s has built-in streaming 7000+ apps like Netflix/YouTube/Hulu. You can also instal other apps in Google Play store.Enjoy streaming videos more smoothly without buying extra fire stick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunned at the features and quality
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is the third projector I've owned and the second one I've bought from Yaber. I am absolutely floored by how nice this is compared to the cost. My first big surprise was when I turned it on it went into a quick auto-focus mode and magically focused itself perfectly. The rest of the setup process was equally simple. The coolest thing about this projector is the ability to adjust the picture to any room. I was able to put the projector at the back of the room on a desk and then adjust the picture so it was the perfect size and in the perfect position on my screen. My old projectors would require me to move the projector around and lift it up to get the picture in position. This one let me make all the adjustments digitally quickly and easily. This one is also roughly 2x as bright as my previous projector. I was able to use it during the day time with some light coming through the windows. The picure quality is very crisp and the contrast is nice. The colors are vivid and accurate to my source laptop. The built-in speaker is a big improvement over my previous model, it's still not a high powered booming speaker, but it will be perfect for outdoor movie night and office presentations and stuff. It sounds clear and has a nice bass / treble mix. The screen cast feature and wifi worked well, but I still prefer to use my laptop via HDMI. I think this feature would be good for presentations though. I tried a few different screen mode presets and found the gaming mode to look the best, but I was still able to make it slightly better by making my own adjustments. I have no realy complaints about this projector. I'm blown away at how affordable and quality it is. I bought an Optoma projector in 2017 for $2k and this one is so much better, and only a fraction of the cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simplicity of use and picture quality
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Amazing! I was skeptical at first, but it definitely was worth the purchase!I still have an older Yaber projector for few years now and decided it was time to upgrade.My previous Yaber projector was not that bright and only 720p, so it was decent quality for the price back then. I figured I would give this one a try and I was not disappointed.The K2s is similar in size but with everything better, decent speakers, low fan noise (you can barely ear it), plenty bright for watching in a semi lit room. I even tried it with the full room lights on and it still held pretty good (obviously it’s best in the dark).New functionality (for me), the capability to use different app like Neflix/Prime/Disney… and even Broadcast from your phone everything you want to see directly on the videoprojector.It is really 1080p (FULL HD) quality with great warm colors.Another big plus is the simplicity to startup and configured it, everything is now automatically adjusted, the auto-focus and auto-Keystone are awesome functionality.Overall, this thing is amazing.No regrets on this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top notch! Would purchase again and recommend.
reviews.reviewText: I’m not one to leave reviews. But this item is worth doing it for.Seriously this projector has been such a perfect addition to our outdoor family experiences. I’ve had this projector for over a month now, so can’t speak to longevity, yet. But so far the main parts are phenomenal.The lumens are bright. But not quite bright enough to do outdoor daylight movie viewing. We did have to update our screen to front view only to try and accommodate that. We live in a very bright sunny part of Oregon and in the summer the sun does not set until 8pm. So movies don’t begin until 8:30pm here. We got it to work slightly during dusk once we purchased a better thicker screen. But not as bright as my friends projector that projects over 3,000 Lumens (professional level projector).But once night falls, the image quality is outstanding. The connectivity for the Internet and Bluetooth is a fast is my apple cell phone. Which makes streaming and viewing seamless. I have project it up to 150 inches. Haven’t tested out the 200 inch Max yet. But based off of everything I have witnessed so far I have full faith that this projector will be able to project up too 200 inches without any issues. The keystone can be a little finicky, depending on what screen material you were using, but as long as you know how to do it manually it’s easy to operate. The zoom quality is nice. And the auto focus is wonderful. When watching a movie outdoors, I tend to turn off auto zoom and the auto Keystone, in case the winds ripples the screen causing by the projector to try and auto correct the issue.I have used it both as a front and rear screen importarte and it handled both ways beautifully.Sound quality is great for indoor operation. When doing outdoor we connected via Bluetooth to our outdoor speakers and it had zero issues or glitches.This projector was worth every penny and so far I am very happy with my purchase.My ONLY con is it does not come with a case and so far I have not found a storage/carrying case in my budget that fits this projector. I will continue hunting for one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Yaber K2s projector has truly exceeded my expectations! The picture quality is outstanding, with vibrant colors and sharp clarity that brings my favorite movies and shows to life. Its 4K resolution and HDR support make every viewing experience a joy.Setting up the K2s was a breeze, thanks to its user-friendly interface and comprehensive connectivity options. Whether it's streaming content from my favorite apps or connecting to other devices, this projector handles it all seamlessly.I'm also impressed by the built-in speaker's audio quality, which is surprisingly good for a projector of this size. Of course, for a more immersive sound experience, I connect it to my external speakers, and the options for customization are fantastic.One of the standout features is the auto keystone correction and focus adjustment, which saves me time and ensures a perfectly aligned and sharp image every time I use it.The build quality is robust, and the remote control is intuitive and well-designed. Overall, the Yaber K2s is a fantastic addition to my home entertainment setup, offering incredible performance, ease of use, and value for money. I couldn't be happier with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Build quality is fantastic, and having proper keystone and auto focus correction out of the box was definitely a plus.The image is crisp and clean and bright.The android tv built in is good and responsive and functions well, just like a Firestick. Most apps are available, though there is an issue with ITVX where it won’t play with Android tv. (My father in law bought the same projector the day after I did and has the same trouble.)I have attached a video showing it on my wall with my curtains drawn. It is more impressive at night and I really cannot overstate how good this unit is.The operating system menus are clear and well thought out, and putting actual Amazon Firestick in this and running it through the HDMI gave clear and detailed images.The sound has to be heard to be believed, the. Dolby Atmos sound is excellent, and the bass rumble and clarity are all you will need in a small to medium sized room. I have an AVR 7.1.4 Denon X3800H system running in my main room so understand a bit about quality sound.I was also able to attach my external ROG SSD drive caddy through the USB port and it had no trouble seeing the drive and navigating through the file systems to display images and videos.All in all if you had to go for a projector within this price range (or higher) for a 1080p native with 4K support projector you won’t go wrong.

The media could not be loaded. Premièrement, je dirais que je suis vraiment impressionné par la qualité de l'image fourni par ce projecteur, l'image est nette, les réglages sont simples à prendre en main. L'autofocus automatique est très pratique. D'autre part le dongle fournis permettant de transformer le projecteur en Android TV est vraiment très pratique et agréable à utiliser. Le son compatible dolby atmos est excellent et permet d'utiliser le produit sans avoir besoin d'acheter de home cinéma même si je les recommande tout de même pour un résultat plus immersif il n'est absolument pas indispensable.Le projecteur donne une impression de qualité des la prise en main, les matériaux utilisés sont de bonne facture. En revanche celui-ci est un peu bruyant, mais le son cache sans aucun problème le bruit de fonctionnement de l'appareil on n'est donc pas gênés par celui-ci quand on regarde un film.Le seul point négatif est qu'il n'est pas possible de l'utiliser avec une source de lumière à proximité (voir photo).Je n'ai pas encore testé le produit en mode gaming, mais je n'ai pas de doute quant à son efficacité au vu des performances jusqu'à présent.En résumé :point positif- rapport qualité prix- images bluffantes - compatibilité Dolby Atmos- Android TV- son de très bonne qualité- prise en main rapide pour les non-initiés- Il n'est pas nécessaire de l'accrocher au plafond pour l'utiliserpoint négatif :- luminosité trop faible près d'une source de lumière- légèrement bruyant- Une housse de rangement aurait été appréciable.En somme, c'est un projecteur qui jouit d'un excellent rapport qualité prix à mes yeux, et qui saura satisfaire la majorité des usages. Je ne doute pas qu'un écran de projection augmentera encore d'avantage ses performances. Je pense avoir fait le tour de mon avis sur ce produit, j'espère vous avoir été utile et vous souhaite de bonne séance de ciné dans votre salon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If you are on a budget and thinking about getting a projector then this is the one.Excellent build quality, with a great sound from built in JBL speakers.Picture quality is good with bright colours even in low light.Easy to set up with auto focus and image adjustment (Keystone)As a limited tech guy, I reviewed many different projectors in my price range and the Yaber K2s was top in my opinion.Very pleased with projector.

le tout nouveau projet Yaber est génial. Immédiatement après le déballage, tout semble de très haute qualité. aucune comparaison avec les appareils d'avant.tout y est, câble, télécommande et bien sur le projecteur.le dongle pour le streaming est aussi très pratique.l'installation est facile et ne prend que quelques minutes.le menu est clair.le bruit du ventilateur est très, très silencieux. ici vous pouvez voir la qualité. les films peuvent être regardés sans aucun problème. aucun système de son supplémentaire n'est requis.la photo est superbe, d'une netteté remarquable. le contraste est excellent.le son des haut-parleurs est excellent. pas de son bon marché, mais parfait pour regarder des films.toutes les connexions nécessaires sont disponibles et fonctionnent très bien.La correction automatique de la mise au point est également très pratique. allumez-le, attendez un instant. complet.très très satisfait de l'appareil. malheureusement le sac à dos manque comme pour les autres modèles :)
